scripts.prepare:dev:node: docker cp "$(docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f compose/webpack.yml ps -q webpack):/usr/src/app/node_modules" "src/node_modules"
scripts.prepare:dev:ide_helper: docker cp $(docker-compose ps -q app):/var/www/html/_ide_helper.php src && docker cp $(docker-compose ps -q app):/var/www/html/.phpstorm.meta.php src
scripts.prepare:dev: npm run docker-base -- -f compose/webpack.yml up -d app webpack && npm run prepare:dev:node && npm run prepare:dev:vendor && npm run prepare:dev:ide_helper && npm run down
scripts.docker-ops: npm run docker-base -- -f compose/ops.yml `[ -z "$CI" ] && echo "-f compose/ops-volumes.yml"` run
scripts.dev:all: npm run docker-base -- -f compose/expose-web.yml -f compose/mailhog.yml -f compose/network.yml -f compose/phpmyadmin.yml -f compose/volumes.yml -f compose/webpack.yml
scripts.prod: npm run docker-base -- -f compose/expose-web.yml -f compose/production.yml up -d --force-recreate
scripts.test: npm run docker-ops test && docker cp `docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f compose/ops.yml ps --all -q test  | head -n 1`:/var/www/results ./results
